info.name: Feedspace APIs
info.description: Collection of all APIs available in feedspace.io.

item.name: Auth

formdata.description: Required, will be provided by feedspace team.
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to obtain an access token that grants authorization for subsequent API requests. By exchanging valid credentials, such as a username and password, clients can obtain an access token that serves as a bearer token for validating future requests.

**Response:**  
Upon successful authentication, the endpoint responds with an access token and a refresh token. The access token, when included in the `Authorization` header of subsequent requests, validates the client's authorization. The refresh token allows clients to generate new access tokens without needing to re-enter credentials, enhancing user experience and security.

response.name: Response

formdata.description: Required, will be provided by feedspace team.
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.
Required, refresh token from login API response
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.

request.description: The primary purpose of this request is to obtain an access token that grants authorization for subsequent API requests. By exchanging valid credentials, such as a refresh_token, clients can obtain an access token that serves as a bearer token for validating future requests.

response.name: Refresh Token Response

formdata.description: Required, refresh token from login API response
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.
Required, will be provided by feedspace team.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to fetch detailed information about the user who is currently logged in and authenticated via OAuth. By accessing this endpoint, clients can retrieve user-specific data, including profile information, preferences, and other relevant details necessary for delivering personalized services.

**Response:**  
Upon successful authentication and authorization, the endpoint responds with a JSON object containing various attributes and details associated with the logged-in user. This may include but is not limited to user ID, username, email address, profile picture URL, and any additional custom attributes.

response.name: Response

item.description: Contians endpoint for registration and login.

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with a paginated list of their workspaces, allowing them to navigate through their projects efficiently. By accessing this endpoint, users can retrieve essential information about each project, such as its name, description, and other relevant details.

**Response:**

The response contains list of all available workspaces along with associated forms as well. features\[\] represent text feed forms, audio_features\[\] represents audio feed forms, video_features\[\] represents video feed forms

request.description: The primary purpose of this request is to enable users to create new workspaces tailored to their specific needs and objectives. By submitting the necessary parameters, such as the project name, description, and any other relevant details, users can initiate projects seamlessly.

response.name: Response

request.description: The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to update existing workspaces according to their needs. By specifying the workspace ID and providing updated values for relevant attributes, users can effectively modify the properties of the workspace.

response.name: Response

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to add a specific audio feed to their favorites list. By sending a GETrequest to this endpoint with the ID of the audio feed, users can mark the audio feed as a favorite within their account.

**Path Parameter:**

- `{audio_feed_id}`: The unique identifier (ID) of the audio feed to be added to favorites.

    "message": "Review updated successfully",

The feedback is helping me get better at my work and provide better value to my clients. Whereas the testimonials, I've been sharing those on social media. request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to remove a specific audio feed to their favorites list. By sending a GET request to this endpoint with the ID of the audio feed, users can remove the audio feed as a favorite within their account.

**Path Parameter:**

- `{audio_feed_id}`: The unique identifier (ID) of the audio feed to be added to favorites.

response.body:
{
    "data": {
        "current_page": 1,
        "data": [
            {
                "feed_type": "video_feed",
                "id": 3296,
                "unique_feedback_id": "ITMCY8",
                "comment": null,
                "favourite": 0,
                "is_locked": 0,
                "is_video_converted": 1,
                "is_audio_converted": null,
                "customer_designation": null,
                "created_at": "2025-04-07T08:40:42.000000Z",
                "feed_fields": {
                    "name": "Anonymous",
                    "profile_pic_url": null,
                    "position": "Engineer",
                    "organization_name": null,
                    "consent": null
                },
                "video_feed": {
                    "static_thumb_url": "https://dm219012nbq21.cloudfront.net/uploads/zhBU6t/thumbs/feed_zhBU6t17440152245212-thumb.jpg",
                    "is_video_converted": 1,
                    "transcript": "Hello, guys. I'm Hamel Kalia, full-time freelancer. Uh, so I, in my journey, I started, uh, full-time freelancing since a 2 year. So at that time, I'm looking for the tool or software where I can ask my client for their genuine video feedback and test text testimonial. So I found, I like, I checked too many, so many, uh, similar tool, but, uh, They haven't fulfilled my actual requirement and a couple of uh tools are actually fulfill my requirement, but it's too expensive in terms of finance point of view. So after 7 or 8 months later, one of my friends list me. Uh, feed space tool. So I explore the entire feed space tool and it's actually, uh, fulfill all my requirements and like in terms of the video feed, uh, feedbacks, in terms of the text feed feedback. So I use feed space tools in 6 to 7 months and actually it's a very unique tool and it's a Uh, fulfill all my requirements. Uh, so it's very useful and, and also useful in my corporate life, when I ask my client, like if, if I want to ask my client for feedback, so I can just share that link so they can just, uh, record a video and give me the appropriate feedback. So I highly recommend that all the freelancer or individual developer to use Fispace tool, uh, in their corporate life. Yeah, thank you.",
                    "file_url": "https://dm219012nbq21.cloudfront.net/uploads/zhBU6t/video-feed/feed_zhBU6t17440152245212.mp4"
                },
                "is_download_enabled": false

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to add a specific video feed to their favorites list. By sending a GET request to this endpoint with the ID of the video feed, users can mark the video feed as a favorite within their account.

**Path Parameter:**

- `{video_feed_id}`: The unique identifier (ID) of the audio feed to be added to favorites.

request.description:
The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to remove a specific video feed to their favorites list. By sending a GET request to this endpoint with the ID of the video feed, users can remove the video feed as a favorite within their account.

**Path Parameter:**

- `{video_feed_id}`: The unique identifier (ID) of the audio feed to be added to favorites.

response.name: Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "Review updated successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 3296,
        "unique_feedback_id": "ITMCY8",
        "public_url": "https://www.feedspace.io/vf/ITMCY8",
        "comment": null,
        "type": "Uploaded",
        "favourite": false,
        "transcript": "Hello, guys. I'm Hamel Kalia, full-time freelancer. Uh, so I, in my journey, I started, uh, full-time freelancing since a 2 year. So at that time, I'm looking for the tool or software where I can ask my client for their genuine video feedback and test text testimonial. So I found, I like, I checked too many, so many, uh, similar tool, but, uh, They haven't fulfilled my actual requirement and a couple of uh tools are actually fulfill my requirement, but it's too expensive in terms of finance point of view. So after 7 or 8 months later, one of my friends list me. Uh, feed space tool. So I explore the entire feed space tool and it's actually, uh, fulfill all my requirements and like in terms of the video feed, uh, feedbacks, in terms of the text feed feedback. So I use feed space tools in 6 to 7 months and actually it's a very unique tool and it's a Uh, fulfill all my requirements. Uh, so it's very useful and, and also useful in my corporate life, when I ask my client, like if, if I want to ask my client for feedback, so I can just share that link so they can just, uh, record a video and give me the appropriate feedback. So I highly recommend that all the freelancer or individual developer to use Fispace tool, uh, in their corporate life. Yeah, thank you.",

request.description: The primary purpose of this request is to empower users to create a "Wall of Love" featuring feeds from various sources, such as social feeds, audio feeds, or video feeds. By specifying the feeds to include in the request's parameters, users can create a customized "Wall of Love" tailored to their preferences and brand image.

response.name: Create Promotion

formdata.value: Real words from real users  see how our product is making a difference!

request.description: The primary purpose of this request is to provide users with the capability to update the attributes and settings of a specific promotion within their account. By specifying the promotion ID and providing updated parameters, users can modify the characteristics of the promotion to reflect changes in their branding, messaging, or content strategy.
